question.title: Status of Flight Tickets

    "Create table if not exists Passengers (passenger_id int,flight_id int,booking_time datetime)"
  ],

  ],
  "database": true,

Create table if not exists Passengers (passenger_id int,flight_id int,booking_time datetime)
